Howdy and welcome to our forum. Your question has been moved from Tutorials because you are seeking help rather than offering it. 

Are you asking about making shuttles based on the real one? If so, keep in mind that this is a very hard thing to do in KSP because of the asymmetry. I would suggest making some simpler designs first and work your way up to recreating the real shuttle.
